name: Vernon's Jerk Snapper
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, jamaican jerk sauce, red snapper, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 Scotch bonnet or jalapeno chili, stem removed
4 red snappers (1 to 1 1/2 pounds each), cleaned and boned, heads and tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine the jerk sauce, onion, thyme leaves, scallion, chili, port (if using) and 2 cups of water. Process until smooth. Pour the mixture into a shallow, nonreactive baking pan. Add the fish, cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 2 hours, turning once after 1 hour.
Prepare a grill or preheat the broiler. Remove the fish from the marinade and place on a fish grid. Grill or broil until the fish flakes easily with a fork, 5 to 8 minutes per side.
